00086 class FunctionParameterValueBase {
00087     public:
00089 
00091         struct WrongParameterTypeException: public std::logic_error {
00092             WrongParameterTypeException(const std::string &_class,
00093                                         const std::string &_function,
00094                                         const std::string &_type):
00095                 std::logic_error("Tried to call default implementation for "+
00096                                  _class+"::"+_function+"("+_type+")!") { }
00097         };
00098 
00099         /* I have to declare the getters and setters for every type of
00100            derived classes that will be instantiated. PITA.
00101            what's worse, i have to define no-ops as default implementation,
00102            because otherwise the templated derived class would remain
00103            abstract. that totally breaks type-safety during compilation.      */
00105         virtual void setValue(const double &) {
00106             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00107                                               "setValue", "double");
00108         }
00110         virtual void setValue(const unsigned &) {
00111             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00112                                               "setValue", "unsigned");
00113         }
00115         virtual void setValue(const int &) {
00116             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00117                                               "setValue", "int");
00118         }
00120         virtual void setValue(const std::string &) {
00121             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00122                                               "setValue", "std::string");
00123         }
00124 
00125         virtual void setValue(const char *) = 0;
00126 
00127         virtual operator double() = 0;                  
00128         virtual operator unsigned() = 0;                
00129         virtual operator int() = 0;                     
00130         virtual operator std::string() = 0;             
00131 
00132         virtual std::string toString() = 0;             
00133     };
00134 
00136 
00147 template <typename T> class FunctionParameterValue:
00148         public FunctionParameterValueBase {
00149     public:
00150         FunctionParameterValue<T>(const T &_value): value(_value) { }
00151 
00153         virtual void setValue(const char *);
00154 
00157         virtual operator double() {
00158             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator double", "");
00159             return 0.;
00160         }
00161 
00164         virtual operator unsigned() {
00165             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator unsigned", "");
00166             return 0;
00167         }
00168 
00171         virtual operator int() {
00172             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator int", "");
00173             return 0;
00174         }
00175 
00178         virtual operator std::string() {
00179             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator std::string", "");
00180             return toString();
00181         }
00182 
00183         virtual std::string toString() {
00184             std::ostringstream o;
00185             o << value << std::ends;
00186             return o.str();
00187         }
00188     private:
00189         T value;
00190 };

00212 class FunctionParameter {
00213     public:
00214         FunctionParameter(const std::string &_name,
00215                           const std::string &_description = "");
00216         ~FunctionParameter();
00217 
00219         operator double();
00221         operator unsigned();
00223         operator int();
00225         operator std::string();
00226 
00228         const std::string &getName() const;
00230         void setName(const std::string &_name);
00232         const std::string &getDescription() const;
00234         void setDescription(const std::string &_description);
00235 
00237 
00241         template<typename T> void setValue(FunctionParameterValue<T> *_value) {
00242             pImpl->value.reset ( _value );
00243         }
00244 
00246         void setValue(std::string _value);
00247 
00249 
00253         template<typename T> void setDefaultValue(FunctionParameterValue<T> *_defaultValue ) {
00254             pImpl->defaultValue.reset(_defaultValue);
00255         }
00256 
00257         FunctionParameterValueBase *value() const;
00258         FunctionParameterValueBase *defaultValue() const;
00259 
00260     private:
00261         //  these accessors are never used, but i like to keep them around
00262 //         std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value() {
00263 //             return pImpl->value;
00264 //         }
00265 //         const std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value() const {
00266 //             return pImpl->value;
00267 //         }
00268 //         std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> defaultValue() {
00269 //             return pImpl->defaultValue;
00270 //         }
00271 
00273         struct Impl {
00274             Impl(const std::string &_name,
00275                           const std::string &_description = ""):
00276                     name(_name), description(_description), value(0),
00277                     defaultValue(0) {}
00278             ~Impl() { }
00279             std::string name;
00280             std::string description;
00281             std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value;
00282             std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> defaultValue;
00283         };
00284         Impl *pImpl;
00285 };

00290 class ParameterFac {
00291     public:
00293         template <typename T>
00294                 FunctionParameter *createParameterWithValue(
00295                     const std::string &_name, const T &_value) {
00296             FunctionParameter *tmp = new FunctionParameter(_name);
00297             tmp->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_value));
00298 
00299             return tmp;
00300         }
00301 
00303         template <typename T>
00304                 FunctionParameter *createParameterWithDefault(
00305                     const std::string &_name, const T &_default,
00306                     const std::string &_description = "") {
00307             FunctionParameter *tmp = new FunctionParameter(_name, _description);
00308             tmp->setDefaultValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_default));
00309             tmp->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_default));
00310 
00311             return tmp;
00312         }
00313 };
00314 
00316 
00319 typedef Loki::SingletonHolder<ParameterFac> ParameterFactory;
